It may feel impossible to fit all of your ideas into a short, meaningful sentence. So when youâ€™re faced with a sentence that is clearly juggling too many ideas, try breaking it up into shorter ones. Each sentence should have one simple thought. More than that creates complexity and invites confusion.
Less is more.
